xwikidoc.title: Import Extension
xwikidoc.content:
{{include document="ExtensionCode.RepositoryCode"/}} Imports an Extension coming from another Extension Repository into the current wiki. This feature is useful for the following use cases: * Adding full documentation for an Extension. * Allowing to search for an Extension for Extensions located in an Extension Repository not supporting searching. * Creating an Extension Repository containing a hand-picked selection of Extensions. {{info}} If an Extension already exists with the provided id in the current wiki then the Extension will be updated instead of being created. {{/info}} {{velocity}} #if ($request.importExtension == 'true') #set($extensionDocumentReference = $repositoryManager.importExtension($request.extensionId, $request.repositoryId)) #if (!$extensionDocumentReference) {{error}}Failed to import extension: #printThrowable($repositoryManager.lastError){{/error}} #else {{success}}Redirect to $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($extensionDocumentReference)){{/success}} #end #else {{html}} #if ($isGuest) You need first to log in or register. #else
#end {{/html}} #end {{/velocity}}
